name: Dretch
languages: telepathy 60 ft. (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)

actions.Multiattack: The dretch makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +2+1d4 + 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +2+1d4 + 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (2d4) slashing damage.
actions.Fetid Cloud (1/Day): A 10-foot radius of disgusting green gas extends out from the dretch. The gas spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a strong wind disperses it. Any creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a DC 11+1d4 + 9 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both, and can't take reactions.
